programme.title: Eleventh Hour
programme.desc: Dr. Hood is brought in to investigate a poison cluster when seemingly unrelated people from around the city simultaneously fall prey to the same symptoms of toxic exposure.

programme.title: Eleventh Hour
programme.desc: Fashion Week in New York City turns deadly when sudden outbursts of rage by people with no prior history of violence result in four homicides in less than 24 hours.

programme.title: Eleventh Hour
programme.desc: A woman accuses the Deputy Director of the FBI of stealing her baby and keeping her forcibly medicated as part of a cover up, and Dr. Hood believes she could be telling the truth.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: In the series premiere, NYPD Detective Raimy Sullivan (PEYTON LIST) discovers she's able to speak with her deceased father, Frank (RILEY SMITH) over his old ham radio.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: When Raimy warns Frank that her mom will be murdered unless he can somehow warn her, she also delivers some devastating news about Stan Moreno (ANTHONY RUIVIVAR).

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: After Raimy uncovers evidence in the Goff case, she relays this information to Frank, prompting him to take matters into his own hands while ignoring a strong warning from Satch.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: With the date of Julie's abduction rapidly approaching, Raimy and Frank each work to gather information from a girl whose mother was taken by the Nightingale.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: When Frank helps Raimy uncover clues from the past to help solve a present day murder case, it brings up two different memories of her first day in the NYPD.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: In 2016, Raimy meets a strange character named Karl (CURTIS ARMSTRONG), who speaks to himself in the future. In 1996, Frank feels like he's being taunted by The Nightingale.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: Raimy and Satch's detective work begins to pay off when a cold case victim leads them to their biggest break -- a room where the Nightingale held his first victim.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: While Raimy and Satch discover a shocking connection to the Nightingale's first kill, Frank and Julie are forced to have an honest conversation. And Raimy has a surprise visitor.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: In the winter finale, Raimy and Frank make a startling discovery about the Nightingale Killer. Meanwhile, Frank is blindsided by a shocking betrayal.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: Frank & Raimy plan to kill the Nightingale, but Frank finds himself agonizing over whether it's the right thing to do. And Raimy is confronted with an unexpected moral decision.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: Raimy and Frank find themselves in the thick of things. Meanwhile, Frank learns the meaning behind a betrayal.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: Raimy and Frank make a huge discovery while continuing their search for the Nightingale killer. Meanwhile, Stan is willing to do anything to bring Frank down.

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: In the season finale, the truth is revealed and Raimy makes a discovery that stops her cold. She quickly reaches out to Frank on the ham radio to voice her concerns.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Smart and quirky Megan Smith (JoANNA GARCIA) is offered a job as the live-in tutor of beautiful and rebellious twin teen millionaires in Palm Beach, Florida.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: When Laurel points Megan's sister, Lily, as being inappropriately dressed at a glamorous social event, Megan lies to Laurel about knowing her. Megan and Sage argue over Rose.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan meets with Rose's headmaster, Jacob Cassidy (recurring guest star DAVID GIUNTOLI), and is disarmed by his age and good looks. Plus, the twins skip tutoring for a yacht party.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan gets too much information about the twins' sex lives, and her own insecurities show up during a date with Jacob (recurring guest star DAVID GIUNTOLI).

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan is forced to cancel her plans for a spa weekend with Jacob (recurring guest star DAVID GIUNTOLI) when Laurel demands she act as chaperone for Rose and Sage's pool party.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: A photo shoot with Rose and Sage for Laurel's upcoming marketing campaign with top photographer Rocco Zaretti (guest star NIGEL BARKER - "America's Next Top Model") is a disaster.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan reconnects with her estranged father (guest star JOHN ALLEN NELSON - "24") and asks Marco to prepare dinner for two at the estate. Lily, Will, Rose and Sage also show up.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan learns a secret about Laurel's past. Sage meets with publicist Patricia Kingston (guest star KATHY NAJIMY - "Numb3rs"), but she is only interested if Rose is also involved.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: The twins encounter blogger PEREZ HILTON on the red carpet at a club and SARAH DREW ("Everwood") guest stars as Megan's best friend from Yale, Caryn.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan has a great date with Will but can't deal with the fact that he is also dating other women. When Rose gets a bad grade on an exam, she decides to cheat on her next test.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Will and Megan's new romance is threatened when Will plans to accept a job in Brazil. Sage "tortures" Charlie's cousin, Luis (IGNACIO SERRICCHIO), who gets a job in the kitchen.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan's mother, Shelby (guest star SHARON LAWRENCE - "NYPD Blue"), who abandoned the family when Megan was a child, returns. Will is jealous when Megan turns to Charlie for advice.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan confronts her mother, Shelby (SHARON LAWRENCE), Rose and Sage throw an elaborate charity dinner and Marco's boyfriend, Keith (DAVID MONAHAN), pushes Marco to quit his job.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Megan wants Lily out of jail, but her father (JOHN ALLEN NELSON) thinks Lily should be left there to learn a lesson. Shelby (SHARON LAWRENCE) later asks Will for the bail money.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Rose's boyfriend, Zach (DAVID FRANCO), gets upset after seeing a picture of Rose and Sage with bassist PETE WENTZ of the band Fallout Boy. Megan meets Will's parents.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: Charlie surprises Megan by admitting he has been in love with her for years. Will reacts badly to the news. And Rose gets some surprising news of her own.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: The twins confront Laurel with their shocking news. Rose knows Sage is keeping something from her and when Sage finally confesses her secret, it changes their relationship.

programme.title: Privileged
programme.desc: KATHY GRIFFIN appears as Keith (DAVID MONOHAN) and Marco's wedding planner. Megan and Will fight and break up, leaving Megan solo at the wedding. But does she leave solo?

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Police officers Van Ray and Deaqon "Deaq" Hayes go undercover to pursue the worst criminals in L.A. They get help from Billie Chambers, their contact within the police department.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq encounter a trio of female jewel thieves who destroy a sports car from the Candy Store. The cops pose as wealthy jewel buyers, but the operation soon goes awry.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq are sent to infiltrate a gang of Russian mobsters. The partners must also stop the contents of a dangerous shipment from entering the United States.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: When Deaq's ex has trouble leaving her abusive husband, Alton, Van worries about Deaq's emotional investment in the case. He and Billie must save Deaq when he's exposed as a cop.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq open a hip Hollywood nightclub to trap a major ring dealing Ecstasy. When the investigation encounters problems, Billie gets involved.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van frees his legendary convict father, Raymond, from prison to help with a counterfeiting case.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: After Deaq poses as a corrupt cop who threatens to expose assassin Sophia Jones, Billie and Van follow her. They must race to prevent Deaq from becoming Sophia's next victim.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Billie assigns Van and Deaq to infiltrate a drug ring along with Alexa, her best friend from the police academy. The situation quickly worsens, and Alexa's life is put in danger.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq struggle to reconcile their different investigative styles when they go undercover to apprehend a murderous pimp. Soon they must make a life-or-death decision.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Billie arranges for Van and Deaq to work with Shane, a gang member they've apprehended, to infiltrate a Mexican gang. But Shane proves unreliable and consequences could be deadly.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq pursue a pair of robbers who use an all-girl valet service to gain access. After the guys learn their targets are lesbians, Billie goes undercover to solve this one.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Billie orders Van and Deaq to train a rookie cop, Jarod. The guys pursue two dangerous blackmailers, but Van is taken hostage. Jarod must take action on his own to save Van.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq infiltrate a criminal enterprise led by a thug who hires out-of-town assassins to kill cops. Meanwhile, Billie fends off the chief investigator from Internal Affairs.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Under increased pressure from the chief investigator of Internal Affairs, Rolland Hill, Billie decides to help Van and Deaq put an end to a recent spate of cop killings.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van, Billie, Deaq and a sexy young counterfeiter, Gretchen, devise a scheme to save Van's father, Raymond, and capture a crime boss.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq's assignment gets complicated when a witness turns out to be a former acquaintance, Cassidy Shaw. And assassin Sophia Jones soon joins forces with Cassidy.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Billie assigns Van and Deaq to protect the 19-year-old daughter of a former arms dealer. But she hates her father, doesn't comprehend the danger and does not want to be protected.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Van and Deaq try to capture a violent psychopath whose killing spree doesn't seem to make sense. They cope with the frustration of a case that may be too bizarre even for them.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: As the birthday of Deaq's murdered brother approaches, Van and Billie realize that he's coping with painful memories.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: Billie and Van go undercover to end the partnership between a crystal methamphetamine manufacturer, Murdoch Goucher, and a pornography producer, Lena, who distributes the drug.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: After a long undercover operation, Van hopes for some relaxation. But his situation soon becomes life-threatening. Meanwhile, an uncovered secret could bring serious repercussions.

programme.title: Fastlane
programme.desc: When a killer named Nick McKussick uses Van, Deaq and Billie to gain control of an incredibly lucrative stash, the lives of countless unknown innocents depend on the cops' success.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A young boy and his family's housekeeper are brutally killed in an upscale Omaha neighborhood. Their case goes cold for years, until another double homicide reveals the link and unmasks a serial killer.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Maxwell, a young professional, is taking a chance on love with three blind dates. Will things get playful with Hannah, stay sweet with Kambree or will Maxwell cross the finish line with Paige?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: When bones are discovered burned in a rural New Hampshire community, a horrific story begins to emerge…one that exposes the secrets of a charming killer living among them.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Rob feasts on fabulous cuisine, makes more than a few new friends and joins a trampoline gym class in one of Boston's oldest neighborhoods.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day make gnocci and join in on a Hearts of Steel rowing team practice along the Allegheny River before ending the day at Grist House Craft Brewery in Millvale.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: After transitioning and battling cancer, Madison Wilkins finally feels comfortable in her own skin. Kinga goes to Orlando, Florida to help Madison let her hair down and experience adventure as the woman she’s always longed to be.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: Renowned singer Vicente Griego takes Amanda on a cultural journey steeped in tradition—from learning the basics of flamenco dance to watching how custom guitars are crafted at a family-run workshop.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: We eat with our eyes first! Enjoy these Baltimore chefs crafting some of the most beautiful plates in the city, from a perfect mushroom stew, to an elaborate Venezuelan ceviche.

programme.title: Completed Episodes
programme.desc: From a para track and field star, to members of an elite octogenarian rowing team and a once-in-a-generation female quarterback, these groundbreaking athletes are 'Boston Strong.'

programme.title: Farm to Fork: Growing a Movement
programme.desc: How cities are harnessing the power of agriculture to make real differences in the health and happiness of community members.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: In these real-life stories of the illicit drug trade, learn how law enforcement beats the smugglers in their high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.desc: Matter of Fact with Soledad O'Brien offers a fresh take on political news to deliver conversations as diverse as America. Here, facts matter.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Breaking Chains
programme.desc: Follow the journey of a sex trafficking survivor who makes her way through Change Court, a program that helps trafficking victims get off the streets, receive counseling, job training and get their criminal records expunged.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Stitch

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: 84% of women have been harassed while running. Not Today, by Runner's World, examines this through the stories of three runners. Mollie Tibbetts and Wendy Martinez were both brutally murdered, while Kelly Herron fought off her attacker and survived.

programme.title: Restaurants on the Radar
programme.desc: Brendan O'Connor has been tracking down and writing about hidden gem restaurants in Orlando for over a decade. Now you get to come along with him on a foodie tour of The City Beautiful to see what makes these places so special and a must try

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
